name: Alarming Disarming
description:
Doing a game a week course and this was the first week game I made.

The theme this week was 10 seconds or less

A short bomb defusing game.

Click the bomb to move it around, click on interactable parts of the bomb to try defuse and with only 10 seconds!

Credits: 

Bomb counting down from Counter Strike GO  - Valve Corporation

Office ambience from youtube - Office Sounds Ambience (Background Sound Effect)

Exploison Video from youtube - stock exploison meme
